quotes.quote: If you think math is hard, try web design!
quotes.author: Trish Parr

quotes.quote: There are three responses to a piece of design – yes, no, and WOW! Wow is the one to aim for.
quotes.author: Milton Glaser

quotes.quote: Websites promote you 24/7: No employee will do that.
quotes.author: Paul Cookson

quotes.quote: It’s through mistakes that you actually can grow. You have to get bad in order to get good.
quotes.author: Paula Scher

quotes.quote: Content precedes design. Design in the absence of content is not design, it’s decoration.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Zeldman

quotes.quote: Great web design without functionality is like a sports car with no engine.
quotes.author: Paul Cookson

quotes.quote: Good design is obvious. Great design is transparent.
quotes.author: Joe Sparano

quotes.quote: Websites should look good from the inside and out.
quotes.author: Paul Cookson

quotes.quote: I strive for two things in design: simplicity and clarity. Great design is born of those two things.
quotes.author: Lindon Leader

quotes.quote: Design is a plan for arranging elements in such a way as best to accomplish a particular purpose.
quotes.author: Charles Eames
